advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
We hear you. Weight loss isn’t easy, but it can be simple. That’s why we created a weight-loss system for your body and a support system for your brain. The Weight Watchers Mobile app brings our world-renowned program to your fingertips so you can stay motivated and on track, wherever life takes you. 

U.S. News & World Report has ranked Weight Watchers #1 Best Plan for Weight Loss 4 years in a row
 
Our eTools and Online subscriptions bring you:
 
PROVEN SUCCESS
 
·  	Weight Watchers Works. Period. Our certified experts have more than 45 years’ experience in helping real people reach their goals 
·  	Our PointsPlus method eliminates tedious calorie counting so you can eat the foods you love and still lose weight
 
EASY TRACKING
 
● Easily track your food, activity, and weight (Click. Track. Done.)
● Track multiple foods at once with our multi-add feature
● Search thousands of foods, meals and recipes that fit your lifestyle
● Compare meals from your favorite restaurants and make the smart choice 
● Scan barcodes to find the PointsPlus value of your favorite foods before they go in your grocery cart 
● Add custom meals or recipes using our PointsPlus calculator
● Play with our fun interactive cheat sheets to find the best bets on the menu, including pizza, pasta, salad dishes and cocktail choices
● Get bonus PointsPlus rewards for exercise and browse health and fitness content
● Keep tabs on your weight-loss progress and stay motivated 24/7 with our interactive chart
 
CONVENIENT SUPPORT
 
● Create a shopping list to simplify your grocery trip
● Find a Weight Watchers meeting in your area  
● Track on any device with automated syncing to your online profile
● Connect and integrate your iOS device with Apple’s Health app 

HEALTH APP INTEGRATION
iOS 8 users can connect to the Health app to sync health and fitness data. 

With this functionality, the Weight Watchers app has the ability to access your total fat, carbohydrates, fiber and protein intake from the Health app, as well as  track your steps throughout the day. The Weight Watchers app uses that information to assist in tracking the PointsPlus values of meals and activities. Keep in mind, enabling the steps feature will replace manual activity-tracking.

Your privacy is important to us. The app will only access your Health data with your permission.
releaseNotes:
● We gave the login page a makeover to help you get started
● New menu icons will better guide you through the app
● Minor bug fixes
